original:
Yahoo! Inc. reported better-than-expected Q3 results on Tuesday, thanks to a surge in internet ad revenue. The company had an earnings-per-share of $0.52, surpassing analysts’ expectations of $0.30 per share, and revenue of $1.31 billion, compared to expected revenue of $1.26 billion.
The surge in revenue was largely due to an increase in internet ad revenue, which saw a growth of 5% year-over-yea
sampled:
Yahoo! Inc. reported better-than-expected Q3 results on Tuesday, thanks to a surge in internet ad revenue. The company had an earnings-per-share of $0.52, surpassing analysts’ expectations of $0.30 per portion, and revenue of $1.31 billion, compared to expected revenue as $1.26 billion.
The surge in revenue was largely due to an increase in internet ad revenue, which saw a growth of 5% year-over-yea
